alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 200 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Royal Palm Hammock, or near Marco Island, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, Lely Resort, Royal Palm Hammock, East Naples, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, South Blocks Golde, Picayune Strand State Forest, Port Of The Island, Goodland, Fiddlers Creek, Key Marco and Cape Romano Aquatic Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
